# portal_client

PortalClient - the Ruby gem for the UKCloud Portal API

This SDK is automatically generated by the [OpenAPI Generator](https://openapi-generator.tech) project:

- API version: development
- Package version: 1.0.0
- Build package: org.openapitools.codegen.languages.RubyClientCodegen

## Installation

### Build a gem

To build the Ruby code into a gem:

```shell
gem build portal_client.gemspec
```

Then either install the gem locally:

```shell
gem install ./portal_client-1.0.0.gem
```

(for development, run `gem install --dev ./portal_client-1.0.0.gem` to install the development dependencies)

or publish the gem to a gem hosting service, e.g. [RubyGems](https://rubygems.org/).

Finally add this to the Gemfile:

    gem 'portal_client', '~> 1.0.0'

### Install from Git

If the Ruby gem is hosted at a git repository: https://github.com/GIT_USER_ID/GIT_REPO_ID, then add the following in the Gemfile:

    gem 'portal_client', :git => 'https://github.com/GIT_USER_ID/GIT_REPO_ID.git'

### Include the Ruby code directly

Include the Ruby code directly using `-I` as follows:

```shell
ruby -Ilib script.rb
```

## Getting Started

Please follow the [installation](#installation) procedure and then run the following code:

```ruby
# Load the gem
require 'portal_client'

api_instance = PortalClient::DefaultApi.new
account_id = 56 # Integer | The ID of your account

begin
  #Returns a list of vCloud API credentials associated with the specified account
  result = api_instance.api_accounts_account_id_api_credentials_get(account_id)
  p result
rescue PortalClient::ApiError => e
  puts "Exception when calling DefaultApi->api_accounts_account_id_api_credentials_get: #{e}"
end

```
